description.para: This structure is to confirm the implementation mode of closesocket and then determine how to operate on the data in an unsent array.

struct_member.mem_description: It determines whether the socket interface is closed after all the data array sent by closesocket or shut the socket interface by force and lose the unsent data.

remarks.para: If it is needed to close the socket interface after all data in array sent, then application program needs to set 1 onoff as non zero.It set l_linger as 0 or the needed overtime value and then call setsockopt(). SO_LINGER socket interface is forbidden to be optional if l_onoff set as 0, which is the default case. Besides, it is not recommended to set SO_LINGER options at a unblocked socket interface and set non-zero overtime value.
